entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Doaktown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Doaktown 7:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -9.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: -12.3°C
Wind: SE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets changing to rain in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the morning and early afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries in the evening and ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
